title: The Mundane Self

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: It's the one that remembers birthdays and has a favorite type of pasta.
dialogue.context: At a birthday party, the AI describes the ordinary self that handles daily life

scene_context: The scene shows people at a birthday party as the Architect describes the practical, social self that manages everyday existence.
philosophical_theme: The necessary mundanity of the socially viable self
visual_elements: Birthday party setting with cake, people celebrating
